nodes.description: Mughniyeh被广泛认为在1980年代策划针对西方的绑架事件
nodes.support_text: Mughniyeh is widely believed to be behind a wave of Western hostage-taking in Lebanon during the 1980s.

nodes.description: 1985年Mughniyeh因TWA航班劫机案被美国起诉
nodes.support_text: Mughniyeh was among several suspects indicted in the US for the 1985 hijacking of a TWA airliner in which a US Navy diver was killed.

nodes.description: 1992年以色列驻阿根廷大使馆爆炸案中Mughniyeh被指控策划
nodes.support_text: Israel believes he was involved in planning the 1992 bombing of Israel's embassy in Argentina in which 29 people were killed.

nodes.description: 1994年布宜诺斯艾利斯犹太中心爆炸案中Mughniyeh被指控策划
nodes.support_text: the blast at a Buenos Aires Jewish centre two years later that killed 95.

nodes.description: 2001年Mughniyeh被列入美国FBI通缉名单
nodes.support_text: the FBI Most Wanted list since 2001

nodes.description: 2006年Hezbollah与以色列爆发黎巴嫩战争
nodes.support_text: Hezbollah battled Israel in the 2006 Lebanon war

nodes.description: Mughniyeh在贝鲁特卡法尔苏萨区爆炸中死亡
nodes.support_text: Hezbollah-owned Manar TV in Beirut announced the death saying: 'With all pride we declare a great jihadist leader of the Islamic resistance in Lebanon joining the martyrs... the brother commander hajj Imad Mughniyeh'.

nodes.description: 叙利亚政府确认Mughniyeh死亡并启动调查
nodes.support_text: Later, the Syrian government confirmed Mughniyeh had been killed and said investigations were still underway to find the perpetrators.

nodes.description: 伊朗和Hezbollah称Mughniyeh为烈士并谴责以色列
nodes.support_text: Iran also condemned the killing, praising Mughniyeh as a martyr and describing the attack as 'yet another brazen example of organised state terrorism by the Zionist regime'.

nodes.description: Hezbollah宣布为Mughniyeh举行葬礼和纪念活动
nodes.support_text: Hezbollah said a funeral service would be held in its stronghold in the southern suburbs of Beirut on Thursday.

nodes.description: 美国国务院谴责Mughniyeh并称其死亡是正义
nodes.support_text: The US State Department described Mughniyeh as a 'cold-blooded killer, a mass murderer and a terrorist responsible for countless innocent lives lost'.

nodes.description: 以色列总理办公室否认参与但前Mossad主管赞扬行动
nodes.support_text: the Israeli prime minister's office later issued a statement rejecting 'the attempt by terror groups to attribute to it any involvement' in the killing. a former head of Israel's Mossad secret service, Danny Yatom, called the killing 'a big achievement for the free world against terrorist organisations.'

nodes.description: Mughniyeh被描述为Hezbollah伊斯兰抵抗军秘密军事翼的特种作战或情报负责人
